110
101
111

1+3+9=13
1+n+...+n^k

00
01
02
10
20
11
12
21
22


1111110 = 2+4+8+16+32+64=
101 = 1+4=5 

126*5=126

21312(4) = 2*1+1*4+3*16+1*64+2*256 = 2 + 4 + 48 + 64 + 512 = 630 P
1001010110(2) = 0*1+1*2+1*4+1*8+0*16+1*32+0*64+0*128+1*256+0*512+0*1024+1*2048 = 2 + 4 + 8 + 32 + 256 + 2048 == F

1166(8) = 6 + 6*8 + 1*64 + 1 * 512 = 630 P

276(16) = 6*1 + 7*16 + 2*256 = 630 P
